hero_description: Full Stack Developer with experience in React and Node.js, building complete, secure, and scalable applications. Skilled in building interfaces, designing APIs, and integrating databases, delivering solutions that combine performance, reliability, and sustainable growth.
about_subtitle: Learn more about my career and professional services
about_who_am_i_p1: I am André Ferreira, a Software Engineering student and Full Stack Developer passionate about creating scalable applications and solving real-world problems with technology.
about_who_am_i_p2: I specialize in Node.js, React, TypeScript, and modern web architectures, transforming complex challenges into clean, well-structured, and easily maintainable solutions. I am currently seeking an opportunity to grow alongside experienced professionals, enhance my skills, and contribute to impactful projects.
about_what_i_do_item1: Creation and maintenance of scalable RESTful APIs
about_what_i_do_item2: Authentication, authorization, and data handling security
about_what_i_do_item3: Modeling, optimization, and integration of databases (SQL & NoSQL)
about_what_i_do_item5: Development of modern interfaces with React and TypeScript
about_what_i_do_item6: Deployment and automation with Docker, CI/CD, and cloud-ready applications
skills_subtitle: Technologies and tools that I master to create complete and innovative solutions
skills_card1_desc: Interfaces with React, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and Shadcn/ui. Focus on componentization, responsiveness, and performance.
skills_card2_desc: RESTful APIs with Node.js (Express, Fastify, NestJS). Microservices architecture, JWT, and security.
skills_card3_desc: SQL and NoSQL databases (PostgreSQL, MongoDB). Data modeling, query optimization, and Prisma ORM.
skills_card4_desc: Focus on clean and scalable architecture with design patterns like SOLID and DDD for long-lasting systems.
skills_card5_desc: CI/CD pipelines with GitHub Actions and Docker. Automated tests (unit, integration, E2E) with Jest.
skills_card6_desc: Asynchronous communication systems and queues for high scalability using Kafka, RabbitMQ, and Redis.
projects_subtitle: Some projects I've developed applying best practices and modern technologies
project_1_desc: Robust RESTful API for a gym system, built with SOLID principles, TDD, and design patterns for high scalability.
project_2_desc: Interactive application for real-time cryptocurrency data visualization, featuring dynamic and responsive charts.
project_3_desc: API for a pet adoption system, focused on clean architecture, scalability, and automated testing.
project_4_desc: A task management application with a clean and reactive interface, focused on state management in React.
project_5_desc: RESTful API for a diet tracking application, featuring user, meal, and metrics management.
project_6_desc: A foundational API built without frameworks to demonstrate the inner workings of Node.js, streams, and middlewares.
contact_subtitle: Let's rock our future working together.
contact_form_message_placeholder: Tell me about your idea or opportunity...
contact_cta_text: I’m always open to exploring new opportunities, exciting projects, and collaborations. Get in touch, and let’s create something amazing together!
